<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ki Rush](/Feats.aspx?ID=432) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 158 <sup>4.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit. You gain the [_ki rush_](/Spells.aspx?ID=485) ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. The rules for ki spells are summarized in the [Key Terms section on the monk class page](/Classes.aspx?ID=8), and the full rules for focus spells appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276).
name: Ki Rush
